narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. This prelicense for a Class "A" license and exit briefing
were conducted with the applicant. 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Applicant must submit license fee to:
USDA APHIS Animal Care
2150 Centre Avenue
Building B, 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
